summary: Tested Photography Guides feature. All features working correctly after fixing missing ObjectId import in admin-dashboard backend. Backend API tests pass (14/14), Frontend UI verified working with stats, table, filtering, and Add Guide dialog.

issues: Minor: Chart width/height console warnings persist from previous iterations
Minor: MUI Grid deprecated props warnings (item, xs, sm, md) - should migrate to Grid v2

seed_data_creation: 36 default photography guides already seeded across 9 categories
context_for_next_testing_agent: Photography Guides feature fully tested. Backend APIs working (list, create, update, delete, get single, stats, seed). Public endpoint /api/photography-guides/public/{category_id} returns guides for any category. Frontend Admin page at /dashboard/photography-guides shows stats cards, guides table with filtering, Add/Edit/Delete functionality.

photography_guides_page_loads.details: Page loads with correct title 'Photography Guides', stats cards (Total Guides: 39, Active: 39, With Images: 0, Categories: 9), and guides table

seed_defaults_button.details: Seed Defaults button is visible and functional. Backend endpoint POST /api/admin/photography-guides/seed creates default guides for all categories (36 total across 9 categories)

photography_guides_table.details: Table shows guide data with columns: Icon, Category, Title, Description, Image status, Status, Order, Actions. Currently 39 guides displayed

category_filter.details: Filter by Category dropdown works. Selecting 'Auto & Vehicles' filters to show only guides for that category

add_guide_dialog.details: Add Guide button opens dialog with form fields: Category dropdown, Title input, Description textarea, Icon selector with Browse button, Illustration Image upload (max 2MB), Display Order number input, Active toggle, Cancel and Create buttons

public_api_endpoint.details: GET /api/photography-guides/public/{category_id} returns guides for the specified category. Tested with auto_vehicles (4 guides), default (4 guides), properties (4 guides), and nonexistent category (0 guides)

import_from_json_form_config.details: Verified in previous iteration 107. Import from JSON feature on Form Config page is working

bug_fixed.issue: ObjectId import missing in admin-dashboard backend
bug_fixed.root_cause: Photography guides endpoints used ObjectId from bson for MongoDB _id operations but the import was missing
bug_fixed.fix_applied: Added 'from bson import ObjectId' to imports
bug_fixed.verification: All 14 backend tests now pass including create, get single, update, and delete operations

api_endpoints_tested: GET /api/photography-guides/public/{category_id} - Public endpoint, returns guides for category
GET /api/admin/photography-guides - List all guides with optional filtering
GET /api/admin/photography-guides/stats - Get statistics (total, active, with_images, by_category)
GET /api/admin/photography-guides/{guide_id} - Get single guide with full details
